"堅い木の実の調達":
"This time I was asked to add something
to the menu to improve bone density.
What am I - a magician? Garongos have
thick bone shells, right? Their diet
consists mainly of something called
\"Hard Nuts\". I'm hoping they have the
nutrients that will bring the magic.
Do you mind collecting some for me?

※Cae de Nv.21+ Garongos."
